column4: Hey people, after some time on Ubuntu, i'm looking for themes and thing that make my desktop usefull and beauty ... i have seen a theme http://gnome-look.org/CONTENT/content-pre2/74813-2.jpg but it has some "widgwts" how can i do that!? i saw then using plasmain KDE, but in gnome!? thanks
:) good luck, hope you find what you're looing for
